CustomField.description: Defines which pay rate the payee will receive when their take purchased leave which is related to a payee deduction record. Either the average pay rate based on the total amount deducted, or, or the pay rate they are on when they take the leave.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines which pay rate the payee will receive when their take purchased leave which is related to a payee deduction record. Either the average pay rate based on the total amount deducted, or, or the pay rate they are on when they take the leave.
CustomField.label: Purchased Leave Pay Rate
